1rp:
Vamos|M|23|20F|-9|KDN|KDN|(Ver.4.00) - Reduced the strength of the pushback, and made the move easier to land.

1lk:
Zancadilla|L|12|18F|-12|+4|+4|Old Patch Notes

(Ver.4.00) - Changed the frame advantage when blocked from -13F to -12F.
- Changed the frame advantage upon hit from +3F to +4F.
- Decreased the distance between the character and the opponent when the move hits.
1lk6:
Zancadilla to Savage Stance|L,SP|12||-12|+4|+4|(Ver.4.00) - Changed the frame advantage when blocked from -13F to -12F.
- Changed the frame advantage upon hit from +3F to +4F.
- Decreased the distance between the character and the opponent when the move hits.
(Ver.4.01) - Fixed an issue in which, after being blocked, Miguel was unable to block an opponent's 13F move.
